title: Bronze 2 looking for ranked team
body:
Bronze 2 Oce player looking for a ranked team. I'll play anywhere but generally go Jung/support/mid 

Ign; Loggel

replies.body: yo I main jg im am bronze 1 with 19 lp add me if you want me in your ranked team ^^
